Start the Foot Switch PCB Last updated: 2023-06-13

Connect Foot Switch PCB to Main PCB

Remove the insulation from the end of the 6 wire ribbon cable and install the foot switch PCB onto it. Again make sure the ribbon is inserted into the side with the rectangular box around the 6 solder pads. See the illustration for guidance.

Solder the foot switch PCB to the ribbon at each of the 6 pads.

Diode (D2)
